import React, { useState } from 'react' import '../Styles/Signup.css' import Styled from 'styled-components' const Headings = Styled.div` background-color: rgb(61,90,128, 0.8); padding: 0.5rem 1rem; color: white; padding: 1rem 1rem; ` const initialValues = { name:'', username: '', password: '', role: '' } const SignUp = (props) => { const [formValues, setFormValues] = useState(initialValues) // Change handler const onChange = event => { const { name, value, type, checked } = event.target; const valueToUse = type === 'checkbox' ? checked:value; setFormValues({ ...formValues, [name]: valueToUse }) } return (
